question: Why this tool?
reponse: To raise awareness of the importance of the team in technology startups

question: Why free?
reponse: To promote this tool more widely

question: Can I use the tool without creating an account?
reponse: Yes but you will not be able to save your results

question: Why creating an account?
reponse: To be able to save your canvas and compare them over time or with those of other team members

question: What is the risk of spamming?
reponse: None, this is not the purpose of this tool GDRP compatible

question: How to complete a personal canvas?
reponse: The canvas has 12 blocks. For each topic, write down a few words or short answers

question: How to validate my canvas?
reponse: When your canvas is complete, take a moment to evaluate each box in pairs and see if they are consistent

question: How to complete a team canvas?
reponse: For each theme, discuss the answers of each team member and choose the ones they agree on

question: What if I want to go further in the analysis?
reponse: You can contact the creator of this tool for support (see About)

question: What if I like this tool?
reponse: Talk about it! Thanks for helping us to raise awareness about the importance of people in startups :-)
